# Algimantas K. - Portfolio & CV

## Overview
Personal portfolio website showcasing projects, CV, and skills in software engineering, AI/ML, and full-stack development.

## Featured Projects
1. **RKnowledge** - Knowledge graph extraction and visualization
2. **Skillz** - Self-extending MCP server for dynamic tool creation
3. **Memory Palace + Red Queen** - Durable knowledge system with adversarial testing
4. **Clean Docs** - Documentation quality validation and maintenance
5. **EmbedEval** - LLM output evaluation framework
6. **Wolf Saga** - Epic fantasy narrative
7. **Complex Parenting** - Comprehensive parenting guide

## Repository
https://github.com/Algiras/Algiras.github.io

## Technologies
- React/Next.js
- TypeScript
- Modern web standards
- Optional: Kokoro TTS integration

## Contact & Links
Visit the site for contact information and project links.
